commenter_a: Well I'd show an officer my id when asked, but some people feel differently and it's their right to walk away if they've done nothing wrong. Obviously she was never charged with "jaywalking", so in retrospect, she did nothing wrong according to her court hearing. Just saying.

Except, it turns out she is not a very kind person either. Her facebook is private now but before this story broke and it was visible, she had posted many things making fun of those with disabilities. She is also appears to be a 9/11 conspiracy theorist. I wish news outlets would look into this before constantly sharing this story.
